Site: Ishibutai Kofun 石舞台古墳 Ishibutai kofun

Site: Takamatsuzuka Tomb 高松塚古墳 Takamatsuzuka kofun
Comments: Special Historic Site with National Treasure wall paintings ( detached in 2007 ) and ICP grave goods

Site: Kitora Tomb キトラ古墳 Kitora kofun
Comments: Special Historic Site with wall paintings of the four directions and an astronomical chart , also recently detached

Comments: Historic Site and temple complex with roof tiles that are among the most beautiful ever made in Japan

Comments: Historic Site and precursor to Daian-ji

Comments: Historic Site with ICP grave goods

Comments: Historic Site

Site: Sakafune Ishi Site 酒船石遺跡 Sakafune-ishi iseki
Comments: Historic Site

Site: Jōrin-ji Site 定林寺跡 Jōrinji ato
Comments: Historic Site

Site: Asuka-dera Site 飛鳥寺跡 Asukadera ato
Comments: Historic Site

Comments: Historic Site

Site: Iwayayama Kofun 岩屋山古墳 Iwayayama kofun
Comments: Historic Site

Site: Hinokuma-dera Site 檜隈寺 跡 Hinokumadera ato

Site: Asuka Palace Ponds 飛鳥京跡苑池 Asuka-kyō ato enchi
